pkgmetadata.longdescription: R Client for the 'ChEA3' Transcription Factor Enrichment API // Interface to the 'ChEA3' transcription factor enrichment API. 'ChEA3' integrates evidence from ChIP-seq, co-expression, and literature resources to prioritize transcription factors regulating a given set of genes. This package provides convenient R functions to query the API, retrieve ranked results across collections (including integrated scores), and standardize output for downstream analysis in R/Bioconductor workflows. See https://maayanlab.cloud/chea3/ or Keenan (2019) doi:10.1093/nar/gkz446 for further details.
